document_data.name: ''Master Ring of the Scaladar''
document_data.creator: [[Trobriand]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''master ring of the scaladar''''' was a unique [[magic item]] that could command any [[scaladar]].
document_data.Description: The [[ring]] was made from [[iron]] and was quite plain.
document_data.Powers: Any commands issued by the wearer of the ring would take precedence over other commands a scaladar was following at the time.
document_data.History: The ''master ring of the scaladar'' was created and worn by [[Trobriand]].
